5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah reported:We prayed along with the Messenger of Allah (may peace he upon him) and he committed or omitted (something). Ibrahim said: By Allah, this is a misgiving of mine only. We said: Messenger of Allah, is there something new about the prayer? He (the Holy Prophet) said: No. We told him about what he had done. He (the Holy Prophet) said: When a man commits or omits (something in prayer), he should perform two prostrations, and he then himself performed two prostrations

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّهْوِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالسُّجُودِ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: As-Sahw (forgetfulness) in prayer and prostrating to compensate for it
